name: South Ufagari Shore
description: The coast of the island is entirely surrounded by rocky hills. You'll have to find some other way to get to it.

name: Ufagari Village
description: The coast of the island is entirely surrounded by rocky hills. You'll have to find some other way to get to it.

buildings.name: Ufagari Smithy
buildings.description: The smithy is specially designed to handle precious metals. You can make silver, gold or platinum necklaces here.
